website_summaries.verdict: You won't find another power bank at this capacity this thin and light, let alone for this price.
pros: It can charge most phones up to 3 times and can also charge tablets, smart watches, and fitness bands
cons: While it has a fast charge option for capable phones, it doesn't have a second port for the option

customer_reviews.title: Stopped fast charging after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I used to love this product. I bought 2 of them! But after using a couple months, it no longer fast charges my phone. Extremely upsetting because I was telling all my friends and family that fast charging was finally possible in a portable format.
customer_reviews.author: Laura213

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my vacation coming up soon after checking out lots of options and reading many reviews. When I received it I charged it up it showed 100% battery life but whenever I try to use it it doesn’t work, I tried pushing the button on the side but it won’t light up at all. I’m pretty sure it’s broken considering the output does not work. I’m very upset because if I order a new one it won’t be here in time for my vacation. I’ve had ANKER brand chargers before and they are MUCH MUCH better!! I highly recommend purchasing something from Anker rather than this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Used product for the price of new
customer_reviews.text: Product was used and had already been opened and visibly scratched everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product last July because it had great reviews. I needed it for a trip to Florida where I knew it would come in handy for charging on the go. It worked great! However, I stopped using at home and brought it back out of hiding for a trip to Ireland where I actually needed it. It didn’t work at all! It will light up and blink while it is charging but it will not charge any of my devices. Super let down by this product and unfortunately I didn’t figure out it had quit working before my return period, or else I would have!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Schott

customer_reviews.title: Not great!!
customer_reviews.text: Takes a good 15 hours to charge. Also, charging an iPhone to the fullest takes a good few hours. No speed charging!
customer_reviews.author: F Deuts

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!
customer_reviews.text: The capacity of a powerbank is always an issue to me. Before I had this, I have to charge several powerbanks to make sure my phone would not be out of battery. But now I only need to charge one and it is good for charging the whole family's cell phones. It works perfectly with the LED light. I don't have to buy these expensive batteries. Instead, I just plug the LED light on this powerbank and all I need to do is to adjust the brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Tao Liu

customer_reviews.title: Best for the dollar, many reasons to like
customer_reviews.text: Far and away best power bank I've owned, out of many contenders. The power bank itself charges quickly off of the wall, but it also has quick charge capability. My Samsung phone, a Note 8, went from 35% to 96% in just under an hour, and only 1 out of 4 charge indicator LEDs went out. I've recharged my phone twice and my LED headlamp once on a single backpacking trip without draining this power bank, and it's stupid small and light. I want to buy 3 more.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Stanphill

customer_reviews.title: Love this portable charger
customer_reviews.text: Love this portable charger. It's super slim and light and gives a fast charge. I originally bought this one  and was unhappy with how long it took to charge, not to mention it is a lot heavier and bigger - and more expensive! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Great portable charger!!
customer_reviews.text: We took this little guy with us to a trip to Europe and we never had problems with charging our devices, especially our cell phones! It charges really quick and last for 2 and a half or almost whole charges! Totally reliable and it isn't too heavy, good size to carry it around. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CandlImomlovestoread

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've had other products like this before but none of them worked as well as i would've liked. I went to europe this summer and I wanted to have a battery bc i take a ton of pictures & i literally didnt have to recharge this battery once during my 2 weeks there. it charged just as fast as a wall charger and for the quality it's not ridiculously bulky or anything. I got quite a few compliments on it from my travel buddies. it's sleek and easily fits into anything i wanted to carry it in. i 100% recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Kate Vojtkofsky

customer_reviews.title: holy crap it's so light
customer_reviews.text: i got this as a replacement for the previous battery pack i had that was the same amount of mAh, i would've ordered it again but i liked the idea of lighter battery pack, so i took a chance and ordered this one instead. i'm *really* glad i did, not only is it amazingly slim/light/easy to travel with - it charges my phone really quickly compared to what i was used to with my old battery. i'm extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Giselle Almonte

customer_reviews.title: Died after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I have been happily using this charger until the past week. It has been starting to charge my LGG5 phone and then it has decided to bail after a few minutes, even though the lights on the end showed it to be fully charged. Then yesterday, my phone told me out of the blue that the charger is incompatible with my phone, even though I have used the charger every day for three months. In addition, the charger actually emptied what was left of my phone battery instead of charging it! I do not recommend purchase of such a short-lived product.
customer_reviews.author: MJR

customer_reviews.title: So incredibly happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband when he went out of the country on a week-long company offsite trip with lots of meetings. He needed to rely on his phone to continue working during the meetings and outlets were few and far between. This charged quickly and then had enough battery to charge his phone over three times fully. Honestly I couldn't be more pleased with this battery pack. We will be buying a few more for traveling and for camping. Legitimately the most happy I've ever been with a portable phone charger. The footprint of the charger is perfect, just about the same size as the phone, which makes it exceedingly convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to carry
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, who was going to a convention. He used it for his iPhone 7 and iPad Pro - and had days where he was gaming for 14 hours and he didn't ever run out of power in either of his devices (note: he was table top gaming, and using the devices for reference material and character development - he was not continuously playing video games on the consoles). I will carry the power pack with me on longer runs as I'm an ultrarunner. Definitely well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Meg C.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I have had about a year now and it's still a great product. I use it frequently. It charges my phone very quickly. Lights on side will tell you how low the battery is and when it is fully charged when charging. The battery lasts days. Great value, a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Shore Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good solid charger
customer_reviews.text: Holds a charge that allows me to recharge my iPhone multiple times. It was a lifesaver when I was on a retreat without access to a wall charger. Seems to be very solidly built. The only negative for me was that while charging my phone, there are a set of small LED lights that flash, which is annoying when I was trying to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: T. Artrip

customer_reviews.title: Quality product that fits in a pocket
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite charger. Great weight/capacity balance that you can slip into a back pocket. 10,000mAh can charge phone multiple times and charge ipad about 75% once. Unit working as expected. No issues. Need longer use with multiple charge/discharge cycles to determine if the quality is long lasting. Really like configuration that permits using a lightning cable to charge the battery and then using the same cable to charge iphone or ipad thus requiring only a single cable for travel. Charges even faster with USB-C and high capacity charger (which we use at home). Case material is hard plastic and I believe it will crack if dropped.on a hard surface especially if the edge makes the first impact. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Go bears

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Expect it to Be This Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this charger for a trip through Canada a couple of months ago. This WAY outdid the one I had bought directly from Verizon a couple of years ago that died for good in less than 6 months and didn't hold a charge long during a European vacation. This model kicks butt!! Charges my phone or iPad super fast and holds its own charge for a good couple of days before needing to be charged back up. And the price? Half of what I paid for the one at Verizon! Can't beat that!!
customer_reviews.author: MaybeKatie

customer_reviews.title: Battery swelling.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product in September last year and it worked well for a while till I was surprised to see that the battery had enlarged and it had a noticeable bulge on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: Nsikan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: We originally ordered a different portable charger but were not happy with it. We received this power pack very quickly and are very happy with it. Holds the charge a long time. comes with a charger cord and a cloth holder to keep it from getting scratched up
customer_reviews.author: fast and fun.  enjoying it immensely

customer_reviews.title: Great backup device!
customer_reviews.text: I carry this little gem in my purse all the time now. I listen to audio books which uses a lot of battery on my phone. Halfway through the day I have to charge my phone again and wherever I am this takes care of the problem. It's about the same size as my phone so I can keep the two together without it being cumbersome. It will charge my phone about 4 times before I have to recharge it. I've used it for several months now and LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Penrose

customer_reviews.title: does not last
customer_reviews.text: i bought this in Aug. 2018 and it already died Feb. 2019. it does not power on no more. i even charged it over night and in the morning i still can't power it on. just not working at all, i switch cables but don't work either. i guess it's worth it for what you pay for. I'll buy again, after all it did last me 5 months and $30 does not last me a day lol ..
customer_reviews.author: tong lee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: The ZMI PowerPack phone charger is amazing. I replaced a mophie case which has a built in charger but the case didn’t protect the phone from breaking when dropped and was only good for a 95% phone charge when needed. Not only did the ZMI PowerPack charge my iphone 6s plus to 100%, it still had enough to charge three more phones. I didn’t notice a significant difference in the charging speed otherwise it works as expected. Although it’s not as convenient as having a case with built in charger, at least I can continue to use my existing cases and have a charge ready when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus

customer_reviews.title: You'll Have Power for a While
customer_reviews.text: I have had this battery for over 6 months now, I have committed to only review products once I have used them for a reasonable amount of time. I bought this for a missions trip to Cambodia and I am very happy with the power bank. The 2 USB outlets makes it super convenient and it charges (full charge) all my devices at least twice, including phone, GoPro and gimball. The first charge takes a while but after that one night is more than enough and it lasts me 2 days of continuous use. If I had to say something negative about it, would be that it is heavy and large but nothing unbearable. I highly recommend this power bank.
customer_reviews.author: Mariela Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: It’s Bursting!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these: one 2 yrs and 2 months ago, the other 1 yr and 2 months ago. I don’t know which this is, but in either case it did not last long enough before swelling to the point of cracking the plastic. I have two Anker batteries much older than both ZMIs. I’m very disappointed in the ZMI as I like this size for my handbags.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mclarty

customer_reviews.title: If your main priority is size this is good for how small it is
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this now for a few months and overall and disappointed with the amount of charge I get out of a phone. I have used this to charge an iPhone 6 Samsung Galaxy S7, and Moto E 5 Supra. On average only get one and a half charges out of a full charge. I am not completely disappointed as this is one of the smallest most compact ones I have seen but don't believe it lives up to the description
customer_reviews.author: Marcos P.

customer_reviews.title: Great battery for travel
customer_reviews.text: I use this mainly when I'm traveling for work. It has functioned great for me over the last few trips. Fits great in your pocket and even while attached to your phone it fits in my pocket well. Its really comforting to know when you're delayed in an airport that you have something to charge your devices with without finding a power outlet. Wouldn't travel without it!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Small and dependable
customer_reviews.text: I love the light-weight, slim size. Powers my Android really quickly, but takes a long time to charge my iPad 4 (that beast is slow with every non-Apple charger). Did well in extreme humidity and heat in my travel bag in Puerto Rico. The charge is not as long as my Anker PowerCore10,000, but the price and size are comparable.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Madden

customer_reviews.title: Won't recharge to full power
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly the first several times I used it. However, now I can't get it to take a charge past half capacity, even when I leave it plugged in for 10-12 hours. I can still recharge my devices, but I'm disappointed that I made the investment in a charger with more capacity when it won't fully recharge.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I've had one unit for about a year and it's the best one I have purchased. Im a field technician and oneself is heavily used so having a good charger is a necessity. This thing keeps my phone or my tablet charged when I need them. It has the rapid charge feature and is just as fast as plugging it into the wall. I get a few full phone charges of just one charge of this charger. I typically make sure I plug it in overnight so I can use through the next day. I would highly recommend this battery pack. I currently have two now because of two teenage girls trying to take mine.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Finn

customer_reviews.title: Great product. No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: So I have had this for about two months now. I use it pretty much everyday at work cause my phone does quick. It’s actually perfect and exactly what o was looking for it’s not heavy and it’s the size of my phone. My phone does super fast so I just carry this aroundnin my purse and charge it at night in my car. I can get at least 3 to 4 full charges or if this and sometimes my coworkers use it when I’m done. It really is great no complaints here so far
customer_reviews.author: Jilldal

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on a Samsung Galaxy S10e
customer_reviews.text: Other than this headline, I have no feedback on this item since it does not fit the charging port for the Samsung Galaxy S10e as advertised. I have let the seller know this.
customer_reviews.author: bermudagirl

customer_reviews.title: Worth a purchase but you will still have to buy a high quality cable to use with it.
customer_reviews.text: The powerpack itself has been working great so far, I like how this is a fast charge power pack and the size and shape is really convenient. But the cable that was included is crap. In the instruction manual it says to only use high quality cables but the included cable only worked for about a week before totally ceasing to function at all.
customer_reviews.author: Roque

customer_reviews.title: Best. Charger. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best charger I have ever owned. And I have been through a lot of them. It takes some time to get it charged, but knowing that ahead of time helps. I haven’t actually counted how many charges I get out of it each time - but it lasts for days and through I’m willing to say at least 10 full charges of my iPhone 7. I am obsessed with this charger.
customer_reviews.author: Angie M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I had this for 10 months and it has not died on me yet. I use it almost every day. I have a Samsung S9 and it fully charges my phones at least 2 times from 30%. I charge it once every 2-3 days (I never plug my phone to the wall so I just use this). The only "down side" is that it takes a long time to charge so I just charge it over night so it's ready the next morning
customer_reviews.author: Tiffhanie Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Best value portable charger you can buy, hands down!
customer_reviews.text: Best portable charger ever. I buy these for all my friends and family! They charge my iPhone 8 around 7-8x on one charge, are not bulky like mophies, and they charge your phone VERY quickly, maybe 20-30 minutes for a full 0-100% charge. Been using these for around 3 years and have never had any problems. Have tried many others and this one takes the cake. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kara Oxendine

customer_reviews.title: Won’t actually charge my device
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the ease of being able to charge my phone on the go and being able to just plug in my device and move on. Instead my charger will turn in, and immediately turn off again, making it not only hard to charge my device, but consumes the time it’s suppose to open up in the first place. WILL NOT BE BUYING THIS PRODUCT OR COMPANY AGAIN!!! When I can get it working, it’s works wonderfully
customer_reviews.author: M Bull

customer_reviews.title: Lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: I really like this battery pack because i can charge my phone multiple times before having to recharge the battery pack. The only negative thing is that this battery pack itself takes forever to recharge when you finally need to. To charge it fully takes 12 hours or so, I usually charge it overnight. Considering price I would definitely recommend it. I have an iPhone 6 that is constantly dying around 50% and I have already replaced the battery once about a year ago ($60) so this has been perfect instead of having to replace the battery again or buying a new phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: One of my best buys. Charges my phone fully in less than ...
customer_reviews.text: One of my best buys. Charges my phone fully in less than half an hour and the battery itself keeps its charge when not in use. Went a full week without using it and when my phone died at work the battery had enough power to fully charge my phone. I keep it in my purse and it has never once been fully drained of power. A must have!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie R.

customer_reviews.title: Holds a Charge for a Long Time
customer_reviews.text: Bought and fully charged this about a year and a half ago. Placed it into a camera bag and forgot about it. Just found it and decided to recharge it. Only one light blinking, so it's almost at full charge--even after sitting for about a year and a half. Nice dependable backup. This time, I won't forget it.
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel Schikaneder

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel or long trip
customer_reviews.text: It can hold charge for very long time, charged my phone twice or three times when around 30 or 40 %
customer_reviews.author: ofaao

customer_reviews.title: GTG
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Turbo charges my Moto G4 plus and works well. The only thing is that it seems like it doesn't hold as much power as it states but it's close. It will charge my 3000mAH phone battery almost 3 times before I have to recharge it. It does hold a charge for quite a while without any loss or slow drains. It has sat for almost a month before on a full charge and when I went to use it, it had 100% still remaining.
customer_reviews.author: Sr

customer_reviews.title: Was a great battery while lasted
customer_reviews.text: This was a compact and easy to user portable battery charger for my phone. Took it with me every where. But it only lasted for a few months, and it stopped working. I guess the quality wasn’t as good as I thought. At least it wasn’t that expensive. I just got a better one from Best Buy.
customer_reviews.author: CaliFilm

customer_reviews.title: Charges painfully slowly
customer_reviews.text: I plug it in to charge it, and overnight only 2 of the 4 lights show charge. It fully charges my iphone or ipad, but then I can't get it ready for the next day - it takes so long to recharge! Disappointing. And it is a large unit, about the size of a cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: POP

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My experience with this power bank has been very positive. The size is perfect for your back pocket. It take a lengthy amount of time to charge (overnight), but holds that charge very long. It can charge my s10 Note+ many times over. Very sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: ARLOVER

customer_reviews.title: Best battery pack
customer_reviews.text: I've had this battery pack for 7 months now I use it almost daily at work and home to charge my wireless headphones and my phone and it still holds a great charge everyday. charges things fast and lasts a really long time even after 7 months I came to buy another one for a family member and realized I didn't write a review so here it is 5 stars all day. I greatly feel I've got my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Beware - Stopped charging after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great for the 1st 3-4 months, then it stopped charging. It's lightweight & slim & perfect for vacations or on-the-go. If you read all the other 1 or 2 star reviews, they've had similar problems. I really liked the charger, just know that you're taking a risk if you buy.
customer_reviews.author: JP Herrera

customer_reviews.title: This is a life saver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this right before the second hurricane hit the east coast and caused massive power outages. On a full charge it kept mine and my family’s iPhone SEs charged for about three days, and it still had some juice left. Pretty remarkable considering the heavy use our phones received as they were our only internet source for the duration of the outage, and this charger was our only power source besides our car chargers.
customer_reviews.author: E Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a stocking stuffer for my husband. I didn't realize I needed an additional cable for it to work. Purchased the cable later and charged the phone as directed. Unfortunatley although it is a fully charged device it will not charge my husbands 6S phone. It just wont turn on. Waste of money. But, my fault for not returning in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best charger in my opinion on the market well priced well sized powerful as hell
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few of these, this isn't the king of external batteries! My LG Stylo battery can charge up to four times on this machine and the charge lasts 24 hours on this battery pack. Takes about 4.5 hours possibly to charge fully from zero but it's worth the wait.... Once it's charged you're good to go on a two-day trip and you will have charging in your pocket definitely worth the money and some
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great back-up battery
customer_reviews.text: They work as described and charge phones, or anything else, quickly. I have a bluetooth communicator that won't hold a charge much more than a couple hours, and plugging it into the ZMI allows me to stay in contact with the rest of the family while we snowmobile. It also charges phones fast.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Great formfactor, battery gives the correct amount of juice. Build quality feels very good, but less than a year of not even daily use and the output plug stopped providing power. For a few days I could get it to keep working by applying slight pressure on the usb plug right at the edge of the battery, but now it's quit working all together. (I tried several cables)
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: So far so good - have used it a couple times to charge ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good - have used it a couple times to charge my phone when I forgot to before leaving home. Seems to hold it's charge very well as I have gone for weeks and it remains at full charge. Great tool for those times when you are on extended outings without access to a charging source.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should've bought 2
customer_reviews.text: Either buy 2 or get a bigger one cause it only charges your phone to full twice before it has to be recharged. If not charging something, it lasts days in my experience. But charging back to full can take anywhere from 1-4 hours from what I've seen
customer_reviews.author: Alys

customer_reviews.title: Great battery backup
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item, very sleek and compact. Works as advertised. Kudos to all!
customer_reviews.author: Walter F Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: Portable charger
customer_reviews.text: I actually gave this product a second chance. 1st time the portable charger wasn’t keeping a charge so I contact seller and i wanted a replacement bc maybe that was just a bad battery. 2nd purchAsed was the same after couple of charges the item wasn’t able to hold a charge. Not work the time and $
customer_reviews.author: yvette

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Edited: I initially thought it was a bad product since it wasn't charging but it turned out it's not. The cable I was using was the culprit, I replaced the cable and it's working like a charm. A great product indeed. Fast charging always works on my Note9.
customer_reviews.author: Shwareb

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect, in size, weight and performance.
customer_reviews.text: I lost my previous EasyAcc portable battery charger, and was looking to replace that one. This is lighter and slimmer, and charges faster, and charges my 2+ years old Samsung S6 for 2-3 times at least. Very useful & handy. Have had it only for a month or so now, hopefully it remains this way.
customer_reviews.author: Nobody

customer_reviews.title: Fast charging; easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This little Powerpack is awesome! It powers up quickly and then charged my phone very quickly! We were in Europe and driving around Norway. I needed power immediately and plugged this into my phone. It charged immediately and quickly and we were on our way. I recommend it to all! You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Pass-thru charging: sort of
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's quite well made; and compact for its capacity. However, I purchased it specifically for its support for "pass-thru" charging. While it does pass power to its output while it's plugged in for charging, connecting or disconnecting input power briefly interrupts its output. For use as a power source for a computer (like a Raspberry Pi) this is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: roens

customer_reviews.title: Very small and light for the capacity
customer_reviews.text: This is incredibly small and light for a 10k mAh battery pack. It's just a little bigger than my old Samsung 5.2k charger, and has the same features, like fast charging and passthrough charging. And this also has a type C connection to charge, so it's one less cable to carry. I only wished it could also charge my phone with a type C to type C table, but it doesn't, when I tried it actually drained power from my phone to charge itself, which is pretty pointless. Other than that it's a great product that I always carry with me.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Smania

customer_reviews.title: Power up life saver
customer_reviews.text: I used this for Ex-US travel and it was a relief. It holds enough charge to quickly recharge my Samsung cell 3-4 times and has already gotten me out of a few scrapes where outlets were unavailable for a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: Willij

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Amazing find! I was cautious that it wasn't going to work all that well. It has been a life savor lately. It holds a great charge. We have used it for 3 weeks now and it's averaging about 3 1/2 full battery charges on it's life (from 5% or less on our phones). It also is a quick charger itself. Maybe not as fast as the Samsung quick chargers but pretty darn close.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality and great price.
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have bought many portable chargers. This one is so far my favorite. Small lightweight and plenty of power for 3 full charges on my Samsung Galaxy. The only drawback is the longer cord that comes with it. I like the shorter 6 in micro USB cables which I ordered a six-pack of.
customer_reviews.author: SAT211

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Very reasonable price for the amount of use of this battery pack. Full charge takes a few hours but I plug it up the night before I need it and in the morning it is good to go. Charges my phone quickly and can last me a few days of regular use. Have used it out in the field in 30 degree temperature range and it works just fine. Have used it in the heat as well and I have had no problems. Would recommend to other people for the slim design, battery capacity, and quick charges.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my Samsung Note 9. It will fully charge up to about 2 full charges. I keep it in my purse in case of emergency. It's small and discreet. I did have to buy a new cord about a year later, but its bc I didnt do a good job protecting the cord.
customer_reviews.author: KBPatricia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had this 10 months and it stopped working. The company got me a replacement right away!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt D. Eichholtz

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with both their service and product
customer_reviews.text: The service provided by this company is prompt and sincere. After listing my previous review, they contacted me personally to offer a solution. I'm very happy with both their service and product. For those saying this product takes a considerable amount of time to charge, the product description lists that in their description. As such, those who wish to buy this product should be more aware/diligent of what they are purchasing. Despite the charging time, this external battery works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Van

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product. If you are looking for a portable ...
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product. If you are looking for a portable charger, look no further. This is it!!! It charges very fast and packs a lot of power. It charges both my tablet and phone to 100% with half the power it packs. The price is not bad either. I am very happy with this product. The only con is that it takes about 4 hours to fully charge the portable charger but if you plug it in overnight, it will be fully charged and ready to go in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Ishmael Okai

customer_reviews.title: Good Battery
customer_reviews.text: I didn't end up with as large a battery as I had stolen, but I'm sure it will cover my needs for backup. GOOD, slim, relatively light, and a modest amount of usable charge. Thanks pb
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for long trips
customer_reviews.text: Love this charger! It's able to charge my Samsung Galaxy S8 in under 1.5 hours when its dead. I usually get about 2.5 complete charges on this when its fully charged. It takes quite a while to charge it, so once the battery is depleted I usually charge it after school and leave on it till right before bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: iBriaN

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and Fast
customer_reviews.text: This PowerPack is surprisingly small for it's capacity (smaller than my phone plus it's phone case) and it does charge really fast. If you're an avid Pokemon Go player like me, this will not only keep you going, but charge your phone while your phone is consuming all that energy from playing. It also has a nice LED status indicator for its charge, which some power banks do not. Overall a fantastic quality product that works exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with Quality the first time! Fingers crossed for the second time!
customer_reviews.text: i had this charger for over a year. And let me tell you, im not an easy owner to have. I dropped this charger hundreds of time and it never stopped working! It held battery great and i could charge multiple phone to 85-100% with 4 bars full on the charger. I recently wet mine and im too afraid to use it lol but i hope the quality has not changed!! (will update if it has)
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I used this once on vacation and it stopped working. Wont fully charge. Im so disappointed in my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful.
customer_reviews.text: This battery is my favorite pack ever! I've been using it moderatly for about 3 years and wow. It's a powerful and light little pack. It's charged my old s9+ maybe 5 times before needing a charge and my new Note 20 ultra 3 times before needing one. This pack is much much MUCH smaller than most 10,000mAh packs out there and size matters for me 😳
customer_reviews.author: Jared A.

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware. This worked fine for a while. I thought it was great at first. Now, when I plug it into my phone, it drains my phones battery to ZERO is less than 30 seconds and my phone dies. It's done this several times now. Yes, its charged completely when I plug my phone into it. DO NOT RECCOMEND AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin West

customer_reviews.title: So far so good very happy with the product it is very thin ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good very happy with the product it is very thin and it took a little while to get a full charge and I'm impressed with it for the money I think it's well worth it
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I tried this with my iPad and iPhone. Charged them just fine. Not rapid charging on these items, but doesn't seem any slower than using a regular charging block either. Looking forward to traveling with it!
customer_reviews.author: Hi2Lou

customer_reviews.title: So much charge!
customer_reviews.text: I love it so much,basically charges my phone 4 times before it dies. It's really great because my mooching siblings don't kill it as fast as my previous chargers. This way the get to charge their phones and I still get to charge mine too!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea M.

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should carry one of these.
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for traveling and already used it twice. Rental cars in Latin America don’t always have universal ports so this was a godsend! My son also used it at a restaurant when he realized his phone was dying. An important travel tool!
customer_reviews.author: gael poltrack

customer_reviews.title: Compact charger that packs a lot of charge
customer_reviews.text: It's about the size of a standard phone and a very versatile charger. On my trip to Spain, I carried it in my day trip bag and was able to charge my aging iPhone5 several times and my Fuji XP camera and there was still about half charge left. It comes with USB to micro USB to charge it. You use USB to Thunderbolt out or USB to micro USB out to charge your devices. Great price, nice design, versatile and lightweight with a lot of power. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lyss

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 Weeks
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited and impressed initially as it allowed for at least 2 full recharges once my phone would die. I used it for travel and it was amazing for a few weeks. Unfortunately, after three weeks it no longer works. I was super bummed because it was great at the start.
customer_reviews.author: John Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Fast charge!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. This can be charged with both Micro B 2.0 and USB Type C cables. The output is a standard USB. Works well. It is enough for two charges of my Samsung Note 8, and it charges fast!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Works great but has other uses too!
customer_reviews.text: Also works great as a "remote" power supply for a security camera or anything that uses 5a input.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J

customer_reviews.title: I am Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a hiking trip. I have tested this out a few times and I am very impressed. My first impression was that this was too light to be of good quality. I was wrong. I get almost 4 full charges on my IPhone 7 Plus. I am leaving the heavier inferior chargers behind and taking this on my hike! The only draw back is it’s not water resistant but a small dry sack fixes that.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Fast Charging... Not really.
customer_reviews.text: This battery pack does not charge fast. It might allow for your phone to charge fast, but charging this pack can take hours and will leave you with about 2.5 charges on your phone. This is no good if your looking for a quick charging battery pack.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Winter

customer_reviews.title: Best I Have Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed!!! Charges decently quick, then charges my phone battery with no problem with still far more ability to charge. Best battery pack I’ve encountered, and it’s so easy to charge &’I love all the input options & the ability to turn it off or check the battery while it is plugged into my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with this little charger
customer_reviews.text: Two of these are better than one 20k MaH charger. It's really wonderfully light and small, fits into any pocket. The cables are the big part!
customer_reviews.author: David Siegel

customer_reviews.title: I just LOVE this item
customer_reviews.text: Small, light, basic, charges my phone fast up to 3 or even 4 times. What more do I need? It's rare that I review anything but boy, this is great. Same size as my phone so I can slip it in my back pocket along with the phone itself.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Rose

customer_reviews.title: Works As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I used this power bank for sports activities such as backpacking and cycling because it's one of the most compact and lightweight on the market. It works great. It holds power consistently. I can recharge my Samsung Note about 2.5 times. Weight of power bank only (no cables) is 180g.
customer_reviews.author: Michal P. Galicki

customer_reviews.title: good charger
customer_reviews.text: nice an compact size light weight good battery capacity good looking durable descent price
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Wior

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 3 ordered worked great
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 of these battery chargers. After initial charging- 2 of 3 worked great, the 3rd was completely dead. The ones that work, have been really useful with multiple recharges. The one that didn't work- we were travelling all of July and missed the 30d return window. Product works great if you get one that works. Though it seems to be a bit of a crap-shoot (67%).
customer_reviews.author: ddixjr

customer_reviews.title: The perfect charger
customer_reviews.text: Super compact, long battery life and charges fast. I took this with me through the hawaiian mountains during my 6 month voyage and it saved me several times. I can not recommend this product enough. I still use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Danny S

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This comes in handy when it comes to charging my iphone 7. Im able to get about 3 sometimes 4 charges before the powerbank dies. The size is perfect to either fit in any of my bags/purses, or even carry behind my phone while its in my hand. The only con is that it literally takes about 12+ hours to fully recharge it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced.  Better values available.
customer_reviews.text: About 1/3 more expensive than the Omar Battery Pack and takes more than twice as long to charge and charge doesn't last as long as Omar
customer_reviews.author: Galen lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Compact and holds many recharges
customer_reviews.text: Use it more often than previous one. Smaller and lighter, but have never run it down (whereas previous one--without as many Amp-hrs--got run down to the point of not charging any more pretty regularly).
customer_reviews.author: C. Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Great gadet, your love ones will steal it
customer_reviews.text: My favorite little gadget that my boyfriend tends to steal from me a lot since it's so small and portable. He regrets his big clunky monster. I just love the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia N.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with product. Charges my iPhone 7 really fast and when fully charged can charge my phone multiple times. Nice and compact. Not feather light, but not super heavy either.
customer_reviews.author: smb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is very lightweight and durable. I bought it as a backup battery for my LG G5, not expecting to charge high speed. I was pleasantly wrong! The seller provided easy and clear instructions on how to properly use it on my Android and I am a happy camper! Highly recommended! Fantastic customer service! So affordable too.
customer_reviews.author: Laurielle

customer_reviews.title: Thin battery with quick charge.
customer_reviews.text: I have some other batteries with similar power this one is thin and light compared to those so I really like it. Charging seems fast and it is working great so far.
customer_reviews.author: forestergarvinbrown

product_meta.title: ZMI PowerPack 10K Smallest Lightest 10000mAh Battery Pack Fast Charging Portable Charger Pocket Power Bank for iPhone iPad Samsung (NOT Compatible with iPhone 11 Pro/Max, Nexus, Pixel /2/3/3a/XL)
feature_bullets: POCKETABLE AND VERSATILE: The smallest and lightest 10000 mAh portable battery pack on the market – only 6.2 oz and 40% thinner than most 10000 mAh power banks. Perfect for your pocket or bag. Thoughtful anti-slip surface ensures a secure grip. Charges tablets, phones, connected watches, Bluetooth earphones and Fitbit via three modes: high-speed (Quick Charge 2.0), normal, and low-power. Dual input interface – fast rechargeable via Micro USB or USB-C port. USB-C port is for INPUT ONLY

SUPERIOR ENERGY DENSITY AND EFFICIENCY: Uses premium battery cells with energy density as high as 664Wh/L, and delivers the same charging capacity while weighing 10% less than similar products on the market. Leverages Zimi’s proprietary power management IC technology custom designed to seamlessly integrate with the premium battery components onboard and maximize their energy conversion efficiency

GUARANTEED SAFETY: Premium components and circuitry for the finest quality and safety. FCC, USTC, CEC, and RoHS certified. We have cumulatively shipped over eighty million portable chargers/power banks worldwide since 2014. We stand behind our products We stand behind our products and will make every effort to ensure that your product purchasing and ownership experience a very pleasant one

COMPATIBILITY: Works with iPhone X · XS/XS Max · XR · 8/8 Plus · 7/7 Plus · 6/6 Plus · 6S/6S Plus · 5, iPad 2 · 3 · 4 · Air · Air 2 · 2017 · Mini 2 · 3 · 4, Samsung Galaxy S10/S10e/S10 Plus · S9/S9+ · S8/S8+ · S7/S7 Edge · S6/S6 Edge · S5, Kindle Fire HD/HDX, LG, Fitbit, headphones. NOTE: iPhone/iPad and non Quick Charge devices will charge at normal speed with fast charging LED OFF. USB PD not supported. Does not fast charge Pixel. Requires separate purchase of USB-C to USB cord for Pixel

IN THE BOX: 1× PowerPack, 1× 6" Micro-USB cable for recharging the PowerPack, 18-month warranty, and lifetime technical support by our US-based, friendly and knowledgeable customer satisfaction team: Call (844) 828-2302 or email support@zmiusa.com. (NOT INCLUDED: wall charger/AC power adapter, Lightning cable for iPhone/iPad, USB-C to USB cable for Galaxy S10 Plus/S10e/S10/S9/S8/Plus and Pixel/2/3/XL sold separately)
